title: Kyrie Irving, Lakers, Rockets, and Aaron Rodgers
itunes:title: Kyrie Irving, Lakers, Rockets, and Aaron Rodgers
description:
Filling in for Colin, Doug Gottlieb gives his thoughts on Boston Celtics G Kyrie Irving not keeping in contact with the Celtics, the Los Angeles Lakers getting F Anthony Davis and their next moves in free agency; Doug also discusses the drama between Houston Rockets Gs James Harden and Chris Paul, plus why Green Bay Packers QB Aaron Rodgers is unhappy. Guests include Nick Wright and Ric Bucher.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
